description: Episode of Series "Learning to be human". Adaptation of the book "He's my baby now" by Jeanette Eyerly, which focuses on a 16-year-old boy and his dilemma after learning that he has fathered a child. Determined to fill the parental void for his child, he finds himself confronting some harsh realities. Stars Rob Lowe and Dana Plato.
